# Run time tests

```{r fig.width=7}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(overview_benchmark, aes(x=factor(n), y=time * 1e-9, color=expr)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_log10()

library(dplyr)
overview_benchmark %>%
  group_by(n, expr) %>%
  summarize(median_time = median(time)) %>%
  ungroup %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=n, y=median_time * 1e-9, color=expr)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_log10()
```
